isis.stitle: TSI 95-12-09 - Replacing The Flywheel Mounting Bolts For All Manual Transmission Applications

subjectgroup.subject: Replacing The Flywheel Mounting Bolts For All Manual Transmission Applications

svcproc.title: DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: The old flywheel mounting bolts, P/N 1 817 846 C1 have been replaced with new flywheel mounting bolts, P/N 1 823 929 C1. Effective on all DT 408, DT 466 and International 530 diesel engines equipped with manual transmissions having S/N 949442 and Above. All DT 466E diesel engines are also affected. The new bolt head has been reduced in height, increasing the clearance between the bolt head and the clutch disc hub. This eliminates the possibility of the flywheel mounting bolt heads rubbing against the clutch disc hub after the flywheel has been resurfaced. The new flywheel mounting bolts are tightened to 136 Nm (100 lb.-ft.).

note.para: It is recommended to replace the old flywheel mounting bolts with new flywheel mounting bolts the first time the flywheel is removed from the engine assembly.

important.para: BE SURE TO USE THE NEW FLYWHEEL MOUNTING BOLTS, P/N 1 823 929 C1 WHEN SECURING THE FLYWHEEL TO THE CRANKSHAFT. IF THE NEW MOUNTING BOLTS ARE NOT USED, THE OLD MOUNTING BOLT HEADS COULD RUB AGAINST THE CLUTCH DISC HUB AFTER THE FLYWHEEL HAS BEEN RESURFACED.
